channel.title: What's your favorite type of game?
channel.description: I'm planning on designing a game, and I'm not sure how to approach my audience. The poll is set to one vote per answer, but if you have more than one please post which. So, post what gametype you like best and remember to VOTE!

item.title: What's your favorite type of game?
item.dc:creator: @towriss towriss
item.description:
@towriss wrote:

i like games like zelda. yea something like zelda ocarina of time would be awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your favorite type of game?
item.dc:creator: @dragonfire455 dragonfire455
item.description:
@dragonfire455 wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:8, topic:348531”][quote author=dragonfire455 link=topic=444910.msg3266795#msg3266795 date=1278912818]
Well, 3D mmorpgs are much more fun and interactive and beat em up type games. Plus with anime it makes it look more awesome :3
[/quote]Idk if I’d be able to grasp a 3D mmorpg let alone anime styled characters. I would be able to incorporate it in a 2d platform like maple story though, as I said before. And do you mean hack ‘n’ slash like Diablo and WoW?[/quote]Yeah. Don’t make it shitty like some of the rpgs out there. I played Flyff and I shit myself it was so horrible.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your favorite type of game?

@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“dragonfire455, post:7, topic:348531”]Well, 3D mmorpgs are much more fun and interactive and beat em up type games. Plus with anime it makes it look more awesome :3[/quote]Idk if I’d be able to grasp a 3D mmorpg let alone anime styled characters. I would be able to incorporate it in a 2d platform like maple story though, as I said before. And do you mean hack ‘n’ slash like Diablo and WoW?

Read full topic
